title: exp/types: clean up objects after test
body:
Linux Mint 13

$ uname -a
Linux M13 3.2.0-23-generic #36-Ubuntu SMP Tue Apr 10 20:39:51 UTC 2012 x86_64 x86_64
x86_64 GNU/Linux

Installing Go from source
http://tip.golang.org/doc/install/source

***  RELEASE  ***

$ hg clone -u release https://code.google.com/p/go
destination directory: go
requesting all changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 13610 changesets with 50725 changes to 7280 files (+5 heads)
updating to branch release-branch.go1
3214 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved
$ cd go/src
$ hg id
5e806355a9e1 (release-branch.go1) go1.0.2/release
$ ./all.bash
. . .
Installed Go for linux/amd64 in /home/peter/go
Installed commands in /home/peter/go/bin
*** You need to add /home/peter/go/bin to your PATH.

***  DEFAULT  ***

$ hg up default
737 files updated, 0 files merged, 4 files removed, 0 files unresolved
$ hg id
6b00514a213e tip
$ ./all.bash
. . .
Installed Go for linux/amd64 in /home/peter/go
Installed commands in /home/peter/go/bin
*** You need to add /home/peter/go/bin to your PATH.

***  RELEASE  ***

$ hg up release
458 files updated, 0 files merged, 283 files removed, 0 files unresolved
$ hg id
5e806355a9e1 (release-branch.go1) go1.0.2/release
$ ./all.bash
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist
# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, linux/amd64.
go tool dist: /home/peter/go/src/pkg/exp should not exist in release build
$ 

Installation from source in the hg tag sequence release, default, release fails.
